description: This table contains some of the relevant information that is contained in the Reportability Response CDA that is sent as a response to an electronic case report. It columns included this table are whether the case is reportable, the SNOMED code of the case, and the timeframe in which to report.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: This item stores the Received Document record ID.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: DTRMN_OF_RPT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Whether or not the case report was determined to be reportable


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Reportable


May Be Reportable


Not Reportable


No Reporting Rule Met

columns.name: REPORTABLE_CONDITION
columns.description: The SNOMED code of the condition that the case report was about

columns.name: REPORTING_TIMEFRAME
columns.description: The number of hours from when the Reportability Response was received before which reporting is required.
